channel.title: Segment on Marín's - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Segment on Marín's - Blog

item.title: Do’s and don’ts for a successful SDE internship
item.description:
Last summer, I had the opportunity to mentor an intern at Twilio Segment. This was a first for me and I really enjoyed it. The experience opened a new avenenue for my career that I want to keep exploring.

By the end of the internship, Kevin (the intern) and I co-wrote a blogpost with some of our learnings and titled it do’s and don’ts for a successful SDE internship go check it out!
